d4-dao.details: Chainlink is a secret ingredient to unlocking the potential of smart contract platforms and revolutionizing business and society
d4-dao.title: DAO

data-token.tg-1-details: DATA is a convenient way for investors to gain exposure in a single ERC-20 token without having to constantly research and rebalance a portfolio.
data-token.tg-2-details: DATA is the first index in the market providing exposure to the Data Economy.
data-token.tg-3-details: DATA provides reduced gas costs and tax-efficient rebalancing.
data-token.tg-4-details: The volatility of individual tokens is offset by holding an index and quarterly rebalances prevent overconcentration.
data-token.tg-5-details: The index follows a transparent methodology to assess tokens for inclusion and removal.

header.title: We show the Path of the Data

what-is.details: Web3 meets DeFi. We are crypto kids, asset investors with in-depth DeFi knowledge. Our value proposition? To help you identify the opportunities that Web3 has to offer.
